title: Big brand agencies and their favorite fonts?
content:
Hi philes!

Wow, this is my first post in ages in here! Real life takes time I guess :-)

Anyway, I'm looking for some inspiration and new blood to my font collection, so I'm hoping to find a list of favorite fonts from leading brand designers in the world. I have found some examples on [http://fontsinuse.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804220833/http:/fontsinuse.com/ "http://fontsinuse.com") (amazing site!).

Any links people?

TIA and Merry X-mas :-)

/S
author: superfetz

comments.content: Maybe following the lead of other designers isn’t the best way to create your own typographic identity. Why not browse [some of the better sources](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804220833/http:/typographica.org/on-typography/my-favorite-font-sources-a-shortlist-of-trusted-foundries-and-retailers/) and build your toolkit based on your own tastes instead?
